trans-unit.resname: J14·1 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Name
J14·1 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: J14·1 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: J14·1 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."
trans-unit.target: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."

J14·2 | Greater Good | Card Name
J14·2 | Greater Good | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

trans-unit.resname: J14·2 | Greater Good | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To examine the causes of life, we must first have recourse to death."\n—Mary Shelley, *Frankenstein*
trans-unit.target: "To examine the causes of life, we must first have recourse to death."\n—Mary Shelley, *Frankenstein*

J14·3 | Riku of Two Reflections | Card Name
J14·3 | Riku of Two Reflections | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.resname: J14·3 | Riku of Two Reflections | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
trans-unit.target: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

trans-unit.target: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

trans-unit.resname: J14·7 | Nekusar, the Mindrazer | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: Whenever an opponent draws a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.

trans-unit.resname: J14·7 | Nekusar, the Mindrazer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His enemies wondered if the lich king's brutal death and unnatural rebirth had been his plan all along.
trans-unit.target: His enemies wondered if the lich king's brutal death and unnatural rebirth had been his plan all along.
